item.text: In the eleventh year, on the first day of the month, the Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="03282 0834">because</st> <st data-num="06865" class="">Tyre</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">about</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="01889" class="">Aha</st>, the <st data-num="01817" class="">gateway</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> is <st data-num="07665" class="">broken</st>; it has <st data-num="05437" class="">swung open</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me. I will <st data-num="04390" class="">become rich</st>,<n id="3" /> now that she<n id="4" /> has been <st data-num="02717" class="">destroyed</st>,’
therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am against you, O Tyre! I will bring up many nations against you, as the sea brings up its waves.

They will <st data-num="07843" class="">destroy</st> the <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st> of <st data-num="06865" class="">Tyre</st> and <st data-num="02040" class="">break down</st> her <st data-num="04026" class="">towers</st>. I will <st data-num="05500" class="">scrape</st> her <st data-num="06083" class="">soil</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> her and <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> her a <st data-num="06706" class="">bare</st> <st data-num="05553" class="">rock</st>.
She will be a place where fishing nets are spread, surrounded by the sea. For I have spoken, declares the Sovereign Lord. She will become plunder for the nations,
and her daughters who are in the field will be slaughtered by the sword. Then they will know that I am the Lord.

“For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Take note that I am about to bring King Nebuchadrezzar of Babylon, king of kings, against Tyre from the north, with horses, chariots, and horsemen, an army and hordes of people.

He will <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> with the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>. He will <st data-num="05414" class="">build</st> a <st data-num="01785" class="">siege wall</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you, <st data-num="08210" class="">erect</st> a <st data-num="05550" class="">siege ramp</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you, and <st data-num="06965" class="">raise</st> a <st data-num="06793" class="">great shield</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> you.

He will <st data-num="05414" class="">direct</st> the <st data-num="04239" class="">blows</st> of his <st data-num="06904" class="">battering rams</st> against your <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st> and <st data-num="05422" class="">tear down</st> your <st data-num="04026" class="">towers</st> with his <st data-num="02719" class="">weapons</st>.<n id="1" />

He will <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> you with the <st data-num="080" class="">dust</st> kicked up by his <st data-num="08229" class="">many</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>.<n id="1" /> Your <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st> will <st data-num="07493" class="">shake</st> from the <st data-num="06963" class="">noise</st> of the <st data-num="06571" class="">horsemen</st>, <st data-num="01534" class="">wheels</st>, and <st data-num="07393" class="">chariots</st> when he <st data-num="0935" class="">enters</st> your <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> like those who <st data-num="03996" class="">invade</st> through a <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="01234" class="">broken walls</st>.<n id="2" />

With his <st data-num="05483" class="">horses’</st> <st data-num="06541" class="">hooves</st> he will <st data-num="07429" class="">trample</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="02351" class="">streets</st>. He will <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> with the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>, and your <st data-num="05797" class="">strong</st> <st data-num="04676" class="">pillars</st> will <st data-num="03381" class="">tumble down</st> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>.

They will <st data-num="07997" class="">steal</st> your <st data-num="02428" class="">wealth</st> and <st data-num="0962" class="">loot</st> your <st data-num="07404" class="">merchandise</st>. They will <st data-num="02040" class="">tear down</st> your <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st> and <st data-num="05422" class="">destroy</st> your <st data-num="02532" class="">luxurious</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01004" class="">homes</st>. Your <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, your <st data-num="06086" class="">trees</st>, and your <st data-num="06083" class="">soil</st> he will <st data-num="07760" class="">throw</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>.<n id="3" />

I will <st data-num="07673" class="">silence</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01995" class="">noise</st> of your <st data-num="07892" class="">songs</st>; the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of your <st data-num="03658" class="">harps</st> will be <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">more</st>.
I will make you a bare rock; you will be a place where fishing nets are spread. You will never be built again, for I, the Lord, have spoken, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“This is what the Sovereign Lord says to Tyre: Oh, how the coastlands will shake at the sound of your fall, when the wounded groan at the massive slaughter in your midst!

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05387" class="">princes</st> of the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st> will <st data-num="03381 05921">vacate</st><n id="1" /> their <st data-num="03678" class="">thrones</st>. They will <st data-num="05493" class="">remove</st> their <st data-num="04598" class="">robes</st> and <st data-num="06584" class="">strip off</st> their <st data-num="07553" class="">embroidered</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>; they will <st data-num="03847" class="">clothe</st> themselves with <st data-num="02731" class="">trembling</st>. They will <st data-num="03427" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>; they will <st data-num="02729" class="">tremble</st> <st data-num="07281" class="">continually</st> and <st data-num="08074" class="">be shocked</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at what has happened to</st> you.<n id="2" />

They will sing this lament over you:

“‘How you have perished—you have vanished from the seas,

O renowned city, once mighty in the sea,

she and her inhabitants, who spread their terror!

Now the coastlands will tremble on the day of your fall;

the coastlands by the sea will be terrified by your passing.’
“For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: When I make you desolate like the uninhabited cities, when I bring up the deep over you and the surging waters overwhelm you,

then I will <st data-num="03381" class="">bring</st> you <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05769" class="">bygone</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>,<n id="1" /> to be <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> those who <st data-num="03381" class="">descend</st> to the <st data-num="0953" class="">Pit</st>.<n id="2" /> I will make you <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="08482" class="">lower parts</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> among<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="05769" class="">primeval</st> <st data-num="02723" class="">ruins</st>, <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> those who <st data-num="03381" class="">descend</st> to the <st data-num="0953" class="">Pit</st>, <st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">be inhabited</st> or <st data-num="03320" class="">stand</st><n id="4" /> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st>.
I will bring terrors on you, and you will be no more! Though you are sought after, you will never be found again, declares the Sovereign Lord.”
